articles.author: Zoe G. Phillips
articles.title: Eva Longoria Moved Her Family Out of 'Dystopian' United States - Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: "Most Americans aren’t so lucky," the actress said of her choice to leave.
articles.content:
Eva Longoria revealed this week that she and her family have moved out of the “dystopian” United States, now splitting time between Mexico and Spain. 
“I had my whole adult life here,” Longoria told… [+1727 chars]
